languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс позволяет себе улыбнуться уголками рта.{/n} "Рад слышать, что мое пребывание на корабле не оставило у вас дурных воспоминаний. Надеюсь, ваше отношение не изменится, когда я поясню цель своего визита".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс позволяет себе улыбнуться уголками рта.{/n} "Рад слышать, что мое пребывание на корабле не оставило у вас дурных воспоминаний. Надеюсь, ваше отношение не изменится, когда я поясню цель своего визита".

languages.text: {n}Heinrix allows himself a hint of a smile.{/n} "I'm glad to hear that my presence aboard your ship did not leave you with any unpleasant memories. I hope your disposition won't change once I have explained the reason for my visit."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс позволяет себе улыбнуться уголками рта.{/n} "Рад слышать, что мое пребывание на корабле не оставило у вас дурных воспоминаний. Надеюсь, ваше отношение не изменится, когда я поясню цель своего визита".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix allows himself a hint of a smile.{/n} "I'm glad to hear that my presence aboard your ship did not leave you with any unpleasant memories. I hope your disposition won't change once I have explained the reason for my visit."

{n}Heinrix allows himself a hint of a smile.{/n} "I'm glad to hear that my presence aboard your ship did not leave you with any unpleasant memories. I hope your disposition won't change once I have explained the reason for my visit."

{n}Heinrix allows himself a hint of a smile.{/n} "I'm glad to hear that my presence aboard your ship did not leave you with any unpleasant memories. I hope your disposition won't change once I have explained the reason for my visit."

{n}Heinrix allows himself a hint of a smile.{/n} "I'm glad to hear that my presence aboard your ship did not leave you with any unpleasant memories. I hope your disposition won't change once I have explained the reason for my visit."

{n}Heinrix allows himself a hint of a smile.{/n} "I'm glad to hear that my presence aboard your ship did not leave you with any unpleasant memories. I hope your disposition won't change once I have explained the reason for my visit."

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスはつい笑みをこぼしてしまった。{/n}「以前、あなたの船に乗船した際に迷惑をかけたと思っていたが、安心した。今回、我が訪問の理由を聞いてその気持ちが変わらなければいいが」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix allows himself a hint of a smile.{/n} "I'm glad to hear that my presence aboard your ship did not leave you with any unpleasant memories. I hope your disposition won't change once I have explained the reason for my visit."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスはつい笑みをこぼしてしまった。{/n}「以前、あなたの船に乗船した際に迷惑をかけたと思っていたが、安心した。今回、我が訪問の理由を聞いてその気持ちが変わらなければいいが」

languages.text: {n}海因里希露出一丝微笑。{/n}“我很高兴，看来我在你的船上这段期间，没有给你留下任何不愉快的回忆。希望等我向你解释这次来访的原因之后，你的心情也不会有所改变。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix allows himself a hint of a smile.{/n} "I'm glad to hear that my presence aboard your ship did not leave you with any unpleasant memories. I hope your disposition won't change once I have explained the reason for my visit."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希露出一丝微笑。{/n}“我很高兴，看来我在你的船上这段期间，没有给你留下任何不愉快的回忆。希望等我向你解释这次来访的原因之后，你的心情也不会有所改变。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se permite una leve sonrisa.{/n} «Me alegra saber que mi presencia a bordo de su nave no le ha dejado recuerdos desagradables. Espero que su disposición no cambie una vez que le haya explicado el motivo de mi visita».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix allows himself a hint of a smile.{/n} "I'm glad to hear that my presence aboard your ship did not leave you with any unpleasant memories. I hope your disposition won't change once I have explained the reason for my visit."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se permite una leve sonrisa.{/n} «Me alegra saber que mi presencia a bordo de su nave no le ha dejado recuerdos desagradables. Espero que su disposición no cambie una vez que le haya explicado el motivo de mi visita».

languages.text: {n}Heinrix s'autorise à esquisser un sourire.{/n} « Je suis ravi d'apprendre que ma présence à bord de votre vaisseau ne vous a pas laissé de souvenirs désagréables. J'espère que vous garderez cette belle humeur une fois que je vous aurai expliqué la raison de ma venue. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix allows himself a hint of a smile.{/n} "I'm glad to hear that my presence aboard your ship did not leave you with any unpleasant memories. I hope your disposition won't change once I have explained the reason for my visit."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix s'autorise à esquisser un sourire.{/n} « Je suis ravi d'apprendre que ma présence à bord de votre vaisseau ne vous a pas laissé de souvenirs désagréables. J'espère que vous garderez cette belle humeur une fois que je vous aurai expliqué la raison de ma venue. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix gestattet sich den Anflug eines Lächelns.{/n} "Freut mich, dass meine Anwesenheit auf Eurem Schiff keine unangenehmen Erinnerungen hinterlassen hat. Hoffentlich ändert Ihr Eure Haltung nicht, wenn ich Euch den Grund für mein Hiersein erklärt habe."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix allows himself a hint of a smile.{/n} "I'm glad to hear that my presence aboard your ship did not leave you with any unpleasant memories. I hope your disposition won't change once I have explained the reason for my visit."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix gestattet sich den Anflug eines Lächelns.{/n} "Freut mich, dass meine Anwesenheit auf Eurem Schiff keine unangenehmen Erinnerungen hinterlassen hat. Hoffentlich ändert Ihr Eure Haltung nicht, wenn ich Euch den Grund für mein Hiersein erklärt habe."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix bir anlığına gülümser gibi oluyor.{/n} "Geminde bulunduğum zamanın zihninde tatsız anılar bırakmamasına sevindim. Umarım ziyaretimin sebebini açıkladığımda da tavrın değişmez."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix allows himself a hint of a smile.{/n} "I'm glad to hear that my presence aboard your ship did not leave you with any unpleasant memories. I hope your disposition won't change once I have explained the reason for my visit."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix bir anlığına gülümsüyor.{/n} "Geminizde bulunduğum zamanın tatsız anıları canlandırmamasına sevindim. Umarım ziyaretimin sebebini açıkladığımda da tavrınız değişmez."
